ygData.subject: Re: We're off to see the Wizard!  this aint Kansas Dorothy!
ygData.msgSnippet: Zartoz, I would certainly favor the chance to escape my bland surroundings and venture freely in the world for a time, however I  must warn you that (as I said
ygData.messageBody:
Zartoz,

I would certainly favor the chance to escape my bland surroundings and
venture freely in the world for a time, however I must warn you that (as I
said before) I have not yet found my Center, and therefore will not be able
to use my Monkish gifts as well as another would. <OOC> Like I said, I'm
only sixth level <OOC> Having heard my final warning, if you still desire my
company I would gladly travel with you for a time. Since I have now heard
you speak of yourself a little by now, I have rather high expectations for
you. Not only do I expect you to be able to define in concise terms the
meaning of life, but also to be ten feet tall. *chuckles* All foolery aside
though, I await our meeting with a twang of impatience... Perhaps I am
overeager to berid of this place?

Madoc

<OOC> EMail can be a unwieldy means of communication. My ICQ # is 5722550
I'll be on tonight until around 8 cst, as well as most other nights. I look
forward to meeting you and any others who would care to meet in-game. <OOC>
